fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.util
Class EmptyDeviceListener<T extends GenericDevice>

java.lang.Object
  fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.util.EmptyDeviceListener<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
DeviceListener<T>, IcasaListener
public class EmptyDeviceListener<T extends GenericDevice>
extends Object
implements DeviceListener<T>

Empty implementation of a device listener. This is class is intended to ease implementation of Device Listeners.

Author:
Thomas Leveque
